title: 2016 Travvy Awards Final Deadline Extended
text:
Last updated: 05:02 PM ET, Thu July 02 2015 2016 Travvy Awards Final Deadline Extended   July 02, 2015 
You asked. We listened. Over the past couple of days we’ve received many emails from suppliers, destinations and travel professionals who were upset that they missed the 2016 Travvy Awards entry deadline. As a result of these inquiries, we are happy to announce that we have extended the deadline to enter the 2016 Travvy Awards to 11:59 p.m. ET on July 31, 2015. YOU MAY ALSO LIKE Qantas Glitch Results in Super Cheap Australia-Los... Impacting Travel 
If you haven’t entered yet, we’re giving you a second chance. The second annual Travvy Awards recognize the best of the best in the industry, celebrating the travel suppliers, destinations and individuals who are voted on by those who know them best – travel agents and their customers. 
With more than 375 awards to win in the categories of airlines, airports, airline consolidators, car rentals, rail travel, travel technology, hotels & resorts, tour operators, cruises & ports, destinations and individuals – there is something for everyone to enter! 
Hundreds of suppliers, destinations and individuals have already entered because they understand what winning a Travvy award means – winners are considered the best of the best in the travel industry – as voted on by who knows them best: Travel agents and their customers. 
Entering the Travvys is easy. Simply visit www.TravvyAwards.com , choose the awards for which you’d like to be considered and then in a few quick paragraphs, let travel agents know why they should vote for you. It’s that simple and takes only minutes to complete. 
Now that we’ve given you some extra time, get your entries in now at www.travvyawards.com 
Questions? Contact Courtney Love, Marketing Director at clove@travalliance.com
